Collector Gouph
Dandy Gouph is a true Dwarf! I have wound my way through the world with many friends to the Bronze Key! Still there are many strange places in the world, so let's go, friends - Let's venture out! Wait, treasures ... Gouph is coming soon! Precious treasures are all ours! Let's venture out to the entire world! Gold and silver worth more than my life ... I am Gouph ... A Dwarf among Dwarves! If my dear love wants, I can even pull out the teeth of a fierce dragon, Yippee! Gouph is Fine!!
Oh bless me - I made another great song before i knew it ... !
Oh, my! How long have you been standing there you ... you heard, er, everything?
